descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Review of description and classification of sedimentary rocks; principles of stratigraphy and sedimentology; methods of local, regional and global correlation; interpretation of ancient depositional systems (facies analysis); cyclostratigraphy and sequence stratigraphy in the context of tectonic, eustatic, and climatic controls on deposition; tectonics and basin analysis.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Mid-term and final exams; class participation; term paper.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: G. Nichols, Sedimentology and Stratigraphy, 2nd Edition, ISBN: 978-1-4051-3592-4, $102.95 paperback
